MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 24-DEC-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the EH10 postcode area of Edinburgh. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.45am to repair a fault on an underground cable located outside 10 Camus Place and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.12am on Friday 24th December 2020.
